Verpitek

Designing games, add-ons, and experiences that push the limits of game engines.

View Projects

What do we do?

We design games, add-ons and other experiences, mostly centering around pushing the limits of the provided game engine.

What are we?

We are a group of passionate developers who create complex and intricate game systems and software, focusing on innovation and technical depth.

Our Projects

LunaTech

A programming and automation centered Minecraft Bedrock Add-On, not only having a proper energy API, but also utilizing a full programming language inside of it for microcontroller programming.

BedPak

A simple API for Minecraft Bedrock Add-On management, providing tools and utilities for modders.

Visit BedPak Frontend

Weboneko

Currently under construction. A web-based toolkit for interactive experiences.

PanSpark

A tiny 16-bit programming language for JavaScript environments, primarily used in our projects for microcontrollers.

Explore detailed documentation, tutorials, and technical references for our projects in the Verpitek Wiki.
